execution_quality: Efficient execution with clean edits and verification via bash testing. The agent correctly understood the constraint and implemented it without errors.
work_category: Implemented a syntax constraint requiring individual parameters to stay on single lines while allowing the parameter list to span multiple lines. Made targeted edits to enforce this rule in the codebase.
summary: The agent successfully implemented the single-line parameter constraint as requested, executing the work cleanly with no errors and appropriate verification. The follow-up request for tests suggests the user was satisfied with the implementation but the slight scope interpretation (not pre-emptively adding tests) represents minor misalignment with what might have been expected as complete work.
follow_up_pattern: User immediately followed up with a new but related request (add tests), indicating acceptance of the prior work and continuation of the feature development.
